31  // Before any test
32  public static function setUpBeforeClass() {
33  hQuery::$_mockup_class = 'TestHQueryTests';
34 
35  self::$inst = TestHQueryTests::fromHTML(
36  '<doctype html>'.
37  '<html>'.
38  '<head>'.
39  '<meta charset="ISO-8859-2" />'.
40  // '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=ISO-8859-2" />'
41  '<meta content="/logo.png" property="og:image" />'.
42  '<title>Sample HTML Doc</title>'.
43  '<link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" />'.
44  '</head>'.
45  '<body class="test-class">'.
46  '<div id="test-div" class="test-class test-div">'.
47  'This is some text'.
48  '<a href="/path">'.
49  'This is a link'.
50  '</a>'.
51  ' between tags'.
52  '<span id="aSpan">Span text</span>'.
53  '</div>'.
54  '<a id="outterLink" href="//not-my-site.com/next.html">Not My Site</a>'.
55  '<img id="outterImg" src="https://cdn.duzun.me/images/logo.png" />'.
56  'Contents...'.
57  '</body>'.
58  '</html>'
59  , self::$baseUrl . 'index.html'
60  );
61  self::log(get_class(self::$inst));
62  }

64  // After all tests
65  public static function tearDownAfterClass() {
66  self::$inst = NULL;

73  public function testClass() {
74  $this->assertMehodExists('fromHTML', self::$className);
75  $this->assertMehodExists('fromFile', self::$className);
76  $this->assertMehodExists('fromURL' , self::$className);

85  // -----------------------------------------------------
86  public function test_static_html_findTagClose() {
87  // A string with misplaced quotes inside a tag
88  $str1 = '<img class="map>Img" "src"="https://cdn.duzun.lh/images/logo.png"">
89  <div class="overlayLowlightoverlayBottom">abra-kadabra</div>
90  ';
91  $str2 = '<img "class"="mapImg" title="What <br>a nice day for testing!!!" ">
92  <div class="overlayLowlightoverlayBottom">abra-kadabra</div>
93  ';
94  $str3 = "<img 'class 4 mapImg' title='What <br>a nice day for testing!!' ''>
95  <div class='overlayLowlightoverlayBottom'>abra-kadabra</div>
96  ";
97 
98  $r = TestHQueryTests::html_findTagClose($str1, 1);
99  $this->assertEquals(66, $r);
100 
101  $r = TestHQueryTests::html_findTagClose($str2, 1);
102  $this->assertEquals(66, $r);
103 
104  $r = TestHQueryTests::html_findTagClose($str3, 1);
105  $this->assertEquals(66, $r);
106  }
107 
108  // -----------------------------------------------------
109  public function test_find() {
110  // 1)
111  $a = self::$inst->find('.test-class #test-div.test-div > a');
112 
113  $this->assertNotEmpty($a);
114  $this->assertTrue($a instanceof Element);
115  $this->assertEquals('a', $a->nodeName);
116  $this->assertEquals('This is a link', $a->text);
117  $this->assertEquals('https://DUzun.Me/path', $a->attr('href'));
118  $this->assertEquals('div', $a->parent->nodeName);
119  $this->assertEquals('test-div', $a->parent->attr('id'));
120 
121  // 2)
122 
123  $ff = TestHQueryTests::fromFile(self::file_exists('data/attr.html'));
124  $aa = $ff->find('a.aa');
125  $this->assertEquals(3, count($aa));
126 
127  // self::log($ff->_info());
128 
129  // 3)
130  $input = $ff->find('input');
131  $this->assertEquals(3, count($input));
132 
133  $input = $ff->find('input', 'name=title');
134  $this->assertEquals(1, count($input));
135  $this->assertEquals('the title', $input->value);
136 
137  $input = $ff->find('input', array('type'=>'text'));
138  $this->assertEquals(2, count($input));
139 
140  $input = $ff->find('input', array('type'=>'text', 'name' => 'text'));
141  $this->assertEquals(1, count($input));
142  $this->assertEquals('the text', $input->attr('value'));
143 
144 
145  // @TODO
146  // $input = $ff->find('input[name=title]');
147  // $this->assertEquals(1, count($input));
148  // $this->assertEquals('the title', $input->value);
149 
150  return $ff;
151  }
152 
153  // -----------------------------------------------------
154  public function test_hasClass() {
155  $doc = self::$inst;
156 
157  $a = $doc->find('a:first');
158  $div = $doc->find('div.test-div');
159  $body = $doc->find('body');
160  $all = $doc->find('.test-class');
161 
162  $this->assertEmpty($a->hasClass('test-class'), 'a should have no class');
163  $this->assertEmpty($body->hasClass('test-div'), 'a should have no class');
164  $this->assertNotEmpty($div->hasClass('test-class'), 'div.test-div should have .test-div class');
165  $this->assertNotEmpty($all->hasClass('test-class test-div'), 'At least one div should have .test-div and .test-class classes');
166  $this->assertEmpty($body->hasClass('test-class test-div'), 'body doesn\'t have both classes .test-div and .test-class');
167 
168  // More speciffic
169  $this->assertEquals(0, $a->hasClass('test-class'), 'a should have no class');
170  $this->assertEquals(false, $body->hasClass('test-div'), 'body should not have .test-div class');
171  $this->assertEquals(true, $div->hasClass('test-div'), 'a should have .test-div class');
172  }
173 
174  // -----------------------------------------------------
178  public function test_hQuery_Element_ArrayAccess($doc) {
179  $e = $doc->find('input');
180 
181  // Short forms of $e->get(0)->attr('name')
182  $this->assertEquals('title', $e->get(0)->attr('name'));
183  $this->assertEquals('title', $e[0]->name);
184  $this->assertEquals('title', $e[0]['name']);
185  $this->assertEquals('title', $e['name']);
186  $this->assertEquals('title', $e->name);
187 
188  $this->assertEquals('text', $e[1]['name']);
189  $this->assertEquals('random', $e[2]['name']);
190 
191  return $doc;
192  }
193 
194  // -----------------------------------------------------
198  public function test_attr($doc) {
199  $e = $doc->find('#img1');
200 
201  // It's magic!
202  $this->assertEquals($e->src, $e->attr('src'));
203  $this->assertEquals($e->src1, $e->attr('src1'));
204  $this->assertEquals($e->src2, $e->attr('src2'));
205 
206  // Standard way of accessing attributes:
207  $this->assertEquals('/path/to/img.png', $e->attr('src'));
208  $this->assertEquals('other/img/here.jpg', $e->attr('src2'));
209  $this->assertEquals('//example.com/full/path.gif', $e->attr('src3'));
210 
211 
212  // Relative vs Absolute URL paths
213 
214  // a[href] relative URL
215  $a = self::$inst->find('a:first');
216  $this->assertEquals(self::$baseUrl . 'path', $a->href);
217 
218  // a[href] absolute URL
219  $a = self::$inst->find('a#outterLink');
220  $this->assertEquals('https://not-my-site.com/next.html', $a->href);
221 
222  // img[src] absolute URL
223  $a = self::$inst->find('img#outterImg');
224  $this->assertEquals('https://cdn.duzun.me/images/logo.png', $a->src);
225 
226  // link[href] relative URL
227  $a = self::$inst->find('link', array('rel' => 'shortcut icon'));
228  $this->assertEquals(self::$baseUrl . 'favicon.ico', $a->href);
229 
230  // meta[content] - not a URL
231  $m = self::$inst->find('meta', array('property' => 'og:image'));
232  $c = $m->attr('content');
233 
234  $this->assertEquals('/logo.png', $c);
235 
236  $c = self::$inst->url2abs($c);
237  $this->assertEquals(self::$baseUrl . 'logo.png', $c);
238 
239  return $doc;
240  }
241  // -----------------------------------------------------
245  public function test_prop_charset($doc) {
246  $this->assertEquals('utf-8', strtolower($doc->charset));
247  $this->assertEquals('iso-8859-2', strtolower(self::$inst->charset));
248 
249  return $doc;
250  }

305  // -----------------------------------------------------
306  // -----------------------------------------------------
307  public function test_unjsonize() {
308  $ser = self::file_get_contents('data/jsonize.ser');
309  $json = self::file_get_contents('data/jsonize.json');
310 
311  $ser_ = str_replace("\n", "\r\n", $ser);
312 
313  $os = TestHQueryTests::unjsonize($ser);
314  $os_ = TestHQueryTests::unjsonize($ser_);
315  $oj = TestHQueryTests::unjsonize($json);
316 
317  $this->assertNotEmpty($os);
318  $this->assertNotEmpty($os_);
319  $this->assertNotEmpty($oj);
320  $this->assertEquals($os, $oj);
321 
322  $t = TestHQueryTests::unjsonize('{"a":1,"b":2,}');
323  $this->assertNotEmpty($t, 'should handle trailing commas in objects');
324  $t = TestHQueryTests::unjsonize('[1,2,]');
325  $this->assertNotEmpty($t, 'should handle trailing commas in arrays');
326 
327 
328  return array($os, $ser, $json);
329  }
330 
334  public function test_jsonize($vars) {
335  list($o, $ser, $json) = $vars;
336  $b = TestHQueryTests::jsonize($o);
337 
338  $this->assertTrue(is_string($b));
339  $this->assertNotEmpty($b);
340 
341  $this->assertTrue($b == $json || $b == $ser);
342  }
